Description: Fragment of base and lower wall of pottery mortarium; low disk foot. Rather fine orange-buff clay with cream surface on outside. Graffito underneath foot: vac πανφα vac.
Bibliographic references: Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (p.32 fig.9, p.42 no.20)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.03)
